description: This file contains unit tests for key-value type classes in the WPEFramework project, utilizing Google Test framework. It tests functionalities of KeyValueType and TextKeyValueType classes, including construction, comparison, and key validation methods.

classes.name: KeyValueType<string, string>
classes.description: A template class for key-value pairs, supporting copying, assignment, and comparison.

classes.name: TextFragment
classes.description: A class representing a text fragment, used as a key in key-value pairs.

classes.name: TextKeyValueType<CASESENSITIVE, TextFragment>
classes.description: A template class for key-value pairs with text fragments, supporting case sensitivity options.

methods.name: KeyValueType<string, string>.Key
methods.description: Returns the key part of the key-value pair.

methods.name: KeyValueType<string, string>.Value
methods.description: Returns the value part of the key-value pair.

methods.name: KeyValueType<string, string>.IsKey
methods.description: Checks if the provided string matches the key.
